Question.Subject: How do you uninstall a tool bar?
Question.Content: TO be specific, how do you uninstall the" gaiarch" tool bar?
Question.ChosenAnswer: Try to uninstall it from ur browser if it's installed in firefox. But if not, you can have a try with Perfect Uninstaller,it is a better and easier way for you to completely uninstall any unwanted application that standard Windows Add/Remove Programs can't remove. Next time, u can directly use perfect uninstaller instead of control panel and u wont have registry problems.

Answer.Content: Try Settings->Control Panel->Add or Remove Programs

Try to uninstall it from ur browser if it's installed in firefox. But if not, you can have a try with Perfect Uninstaller,it is a better and easier way for you to completely uninstall any unwanted application that standard Windows Add/Remove Programs can't remove. Next time, u can directly use perfect uninstaller instead of control panel and u wont have registry problems.
